borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Rear Garden. T1) Bramley Apple (Malus domestica), reduce back to most recent previous reduction points and remove water shoots to encourage fruiting; reduce low limb over neighbours garden back to fork approx 1m below previous and Install cobra bracing. T2) Blenheim Orange Apple (Malus domestica), reduce by 1-2m removing water shoots to encourage fruiting; reduce 1m below previous over Apricot. T3) Apricot (Prunus armeniaca), reduce laterals over garden by approx 1m back to upright shoots; halo Apple tree adjacent to allow more light to Apricot; reduce Apple approx 1m below previous over Apricot. T4) Mulberry (Morus spp), reduce height by 1-2m. T5) Conference Pear (Pyrus spp),reduce back to previous; remove water shoots to encourage fruiting. T11) Cherry (Prunus spp), reduce by 1-2m. T12) Quince, reduce by up to 2m to tidy and encourage fruiting.
